articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Switzerland advance to last 16 of Euro 2020 without kicking a ball - The Star Online
articles.description: ROME (Reuters) -     Switzerland advanced to the last 16 of the European Championship on Monday without kicking a ball, as the results from matches in other groups worked to their benefit.
articles.content:
ROME (Reuters) - Switzerland advanced to the last 16 of the European Championship on Monday without kicking a ball, as the results from matches in other groups worked to their benefit.

articles.author: Andrew Higgins
articles.title: Populist Leaders in Eastern Europe Run Into a Little Problem: Unpopularity - The New York Times
articles.description: The leaders of Slovenia, Hungary and Poland, who rode to power on waves of anti-elitism anger, face rising opposition over their pandemic responses and heavy-handed policies.
articles.content:
Mr. Trumps presidency was never the trigger for Europes populist surge, whose leaders had been around and winning votes for years before the New York real estate developer announced his candidacy.
